abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.412156232a6d42bf]{Battle} +wits by leading groups of warriors in a pincer attack or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} +wits in combat by coordinating a pincer attack with allies, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ed343c963b08f301]{Enter the Fray} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} by charging in a blind rage, choose one.

  • Fury: Roll +iron. Inflict +1 harm on a strong hit.
  • Courage: Roll +heart. Add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c0967ba47f57393b]{Draw the Circle} after a display of physical intimidation, you may roll +iron (instead of +heart). If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. Additionally, when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.be95ca063ded2b19]{Compel} using physical intimidation, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
